name: One life One goal DEMO
description:
This is the demo version for One Life one goal if you wan to know more about the game please visit 

https://powplowdevs.itch.io/one-life-one-goal

one life one goal demo has 1 of 2 game modes with 1 level.

included:

  • survival mode
  • one survival mode map
  • one weapon (pistol)
  • controls and credits scene
  • settings menu

missing:

  • 42 levels 
  • all of campaign mode
  • 2 survival map levels 
  • power up shop
  • weapon shop
  • face shop
  • 4 weapons

if you would like to purchase the full version head over to

https://powplowdevs.itch.io/one-life-one-goal

have a wonderful day and thanks for downloading!
